names.name: Yahweh Eloah Va-Da'at
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Tipheret, representing the state of divine consciousness that results from the balance of wisdom and understanding.

names.name: Raphael
names.description: The Archangel of healing and harmony, who brings the mercy of God into the world.

names.name: Malachim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Tipheret, symbolizing the governance and balance of divine forces.

names.name: Sun
names.description: The planetary influence associated with Tipheret, representing the central force of vitality and illumination.

names.name: Zelem
names.description: Signifies the image of God reflected in the harmony of creation, the divine template within humanity.

names.name: Melekh
names.description: Embodies the leadership and sovereignty that comes from a balanced perspective.
